name: places/ChIJuxG_SP5YwokROkdHou5mzIc
formattedAddress: 545 5th Ave STE 309, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 545 5th Ave STE 309, New York, NY 10017, USA

editorialSummary.text: Long-standing, upscale showroom with an on-site factory, providing fine jewelry & weddings bands.

originalText.text:
Michael and Eric are a great team.
Bought my engagement ring from them 25 years ago and diamond wedding band too.
Through the years they have sold me a new engagement ring when mine was lost after many years, made me a new wedding band with my mother's diamond stones, made me a beautiful "diamonds by the yard"  necklace from my old diamond stones from my original wedding band, repaired numerous jewelry pieces, found me stones to update a cocktail ring i inherited, dipped yellow gold to look white gold, appraised my mothers large collection of jewelry  and reappraised my rings for insurance.
When dealing with jewelry, not always easy to trust people. I've heard terrible stories about dishonest jewelers.
These guys are honest and trustworthy.
I live and work in New Jersey and so not always convenient to get into Manhattan but this is the only place I go for jewelry!

originalText.text: I had a great experience buying an engagement ring from Niletti Creations. I was very new to the process and decided to educate myself by shopping around at multiple jewelers. There was no comparison as Niletti was by far and away the best across every dimension - service, selection, setting styles, and price. Eric made me feel comfortable, was always available to answer my hundreds of questions, and was very honest and transparent throughout the whole process. And most importantly, he did absolutely beautiful work!! My fiance and I could not be happier with how the ring turned out, and we have Eric to thank! We're so excited for the next steps!

text.text: I had a great experience buying an engagement ring from Niletti Creations. I was very new to the process and decided to educate myself by shopping around at multiple jewelers. There was no comparison as Niletti was by far and away the best across every dimension - service, selection, setting styles, and price. Eric made me feel comfortable, was always available to answer my hundreds of questions, and was very honest and transparent throughout the whole process. And most importantly, he did absolutely beautiful work!! My fiance and I could not be happier with how the ring turned out, and we have Eric to thank! We're so excited for the next steps!

originalText.text: Eric was amazing. I told him what I thought my now wife would like and he created it. He also helped to get the exact same diamond I was looking at for about $3,000 less. Amazing service and my wife couldn’t be happier. She get compliments nearly everyday on her engagement ring and wedding band. Eric also designed my band and a set of diamond earrings for my wife. Great service and value every time!

originalText.text: My fiance worked with Eric from Niletti on creating my custom engagement ring. It came out beautiful and I am constantly receiving compliments on my ring. Since then Niletti has made me a custom necklace and both of our wedding bands. He is very friendly, always accommodating, and goes above and beyond our expectations to make the perfect piece of jewelry.

He is very friendly, always accommodating, and goes above and beyond our expectations to make the perfect piece of jewelry.

originalText.text: I have bought numerous rings, earrings, bracelets and necklaces from Eric at Niletti. They have done masterful work with great customer service and pricing.  I always enjoy visiting with them when I am in NY.
